answers.answer: I'm 30 weeks with twins, an I was developed gestational diabetes its common in twin pregnancy but you should really try to eat super healthy.
I have twin boys n it was smooth pregnancy but i lost 35 lbs n was anemic i had a lot of energy n craved sour things bad
I will definately make sure to eat as healthy as possible. Thanks for the heads up!!! And yes, it's very exciting.

Congrats! I'm 33 + 5 with a single pregnancy. Last night my husband was saying how awesome it would be if I delivered and there was actually a twin hiding the entire time.. after 7 ultrasounds lol because then we could just be done having kids.
Congrats!! I'm just having one baby but my middle sister had twins!  They are 20 months now. Hope you have a great pregnancy! :)
Yay!!! Congrats! I'm in the same boat as you. Twins and first pregnancy. Are they fraternal or identical? They told me at 5 weeks ^.^

question: Hi everyone,I just found out yest im expecting twins. Im 8 weeks and this is my 1st pregnancy. Can anyone tell me about their pregnancy experience with twins?
title: Twins on Way
